Namun berlaku satu insiden yang membuatkan Kamarudin terpikat dengan seorang gadis Cina bernama Miss Yap.

programme.title: Puteri Impian 2
programme.desc: Gadis kilang yang menolak lamaran seorang kerabat diraja Tengku Faizal, menaruh hati terhadap jurukamera stesen televisyen, Zul. Nora menyukai Zul tetapi dia telah pun menjalin hubungan bersama Lisa. Adik kepada Tengku Faizal, Tengku Farid ingin membawa semula Nora kembali ke abangnya. Tekad, dia ingin mengangkat semula maruah abangnya.

programme.title: Cinta Bollywood
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Shahrul, anak Tok Penghulu merangkap seorang penganggur yang tinggal di Parit Buntar bersama keluarganya. Dia menaruh hati kepada seorang gadis bernama Asha. Pada suatu hari, seorang penerbit filem telah datang ke kampungnya untuk membuat penggambaran drama berjudul Cinta Bollywood. Shahrul kemudiannya dilantik menjadi production manager dan pelakon untuk penggambaran drama itu. Ketika penggambaran dibuat, Salman, hero drama itu semakin rapat dengan Asha dan hal ini membuatkan Shahrul cemburu.

programme.title: Nylea & Harris
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Harris yang terpaksa bekerja sebagai pelayan walaupun dia memiliki kelulusan tinggi. Dia kemudiannya berjaya mendapat kerja sebagai arkitek di sebuah firma milik Tan Sri Kadir. Tugas pertama Harris ialah untuk menyiapkan sebuah rumah untuk anak perempuan Tan Sri Kadir iaitu Nylea. Pada mulanya Harris dan Nylea sering bertengkar namun lama kelamaan timbul bibit-bibit percintaan antara mereka berdua. Walau bagaimanapun, muncul pula Chris, bekas tunangan Nylea ke dalam hidup mereka yang membuatkan Harris sangat kecewa.

programme.title: Cikgu Romantik
programme.desc: Bercita-cita ingin menjadi selebriti terkenal, Azizah mendapat surat uji bakat yang bertempat di Kuala Lumpur. Dia pun pergi dan menetap di rumah temannya, Tila lalu berkenalan bersama seorang guru vokal iaitu Ramli. Muncul pula Shahrul yang mengatakan bahawa raut wajah Azizah seiras dengan isterinya yang telah meninggal dunia.

programme.title: Kasih Farra
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Farra yang bercinta dengan Lokman, seorang lelaki yang jauh lebih tua daripada usianya. Lokman baru pulang ke Malaysia selepas lebih 20 tahun merantau ke luar negara. Tanpa pengetahuan Lokman, Farra ialah anak kepada bekas kekasihnya, Zura. Dalam masa yang sama, Zura sedang mencari Lokman untuk meminta maaf atas apa yang berlaku kepada hubungan mereka di masa lampau.

programme.title: Ali Setan
programme.desc: Ali pelajar universiti yang nakal dan suka bergurau berjumpa Asmidar ketika dalam perjalanan ke universiti. Ali selalu mencari jalan untuk mengusik Asmidar, lama kelamaan perasaan cinta mula berputik antara mereka berdua. Konflik mula terjadi apabila Ali sebenarnya sudah berkahwin dengan Tipah namun atas sebab terpaksa.

programme.title: Cinta Bollywood
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Shahrul, anak Tok Penghulu merangkap seorang penganggur yang tinggal di Parit Buntar bersama keluarganya. Dia menaruh hati kepada seorang gadis bernama Asha. Pada suatu hari, seorang penerbit filem telah datang ke kampungnya untuk membuat penggambaran drama berjudul Cinta Bollywood. Shahrul kemudiannya dilantik menjadi production manager dan pelakon untuk penggambaran drama itu. Ketika penggambaran dibuat, Salman, hero drama itu semakin rapat dengan Asha dan hal ini membuatkan Shahrul cemburu.

programme.title: Ali Setan 2
programme.desc: Ikatan yang ingin tercipta terpaksa dileraikan kerana campur tangan keluarga menyebabkan Ali dan Asmidar pergi membawa haluan sendiri. Rancangan untuk mendirikan rumahtangga telah diganggu oleh Jeff yang inginkan Asmidar. Ayah Asmidar pula menyuruhnya berkahwin bersama Jeff - namun setelah beberapa bulan mereka pun bercerai kerana tidak bahagia. Ali dan Asmidar pun bersatu semula.

programme.title: Cinta U-Turn
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Faiz, seorang anak lelaki kepada ahli perniagaan bernama Datuk Shuib yang ingin dijodohkan dengan Juliana. Kekeliruan mula berlaku apabila gambar Juliana telah bertukar dengan gambar orang lain yang tidak menepati citrasa Faiz. Dia melarikan diri dan berkenalan dengan Hafiz. Mereka bersama-sama bekerja di sebuah bengkel. Pada suatu hari, Juliana datang ke bengkel itu dan telah membuatkan Faiz jatuh cinta padanya. Keadaan menjadi huru hara apabila berlakunya penyamaran antara Faiz dan Hafiz dalam memenangi hati bapa Juliana, iaitu Datuk Jamal.

programme.title: Puteri Impian
programme.desc: Pekerja kilang, Puteri Nora sentiasa mengimpikan untuk menjadi seorang puteri raja. Impiannya menjadi kenyataan apabila dia diterima menyertai pertandingan "Memburu Impian". Kehidupannya berubah sekelip mata apabila bertemu Tengku Faizal, seorang putera raja. Namun, Zul, jurukameranya dalam rancangan itu turut menyukai Puteri Nora. Pilihan harus dibuat antara kemewahan atau kebebasan.

programme.title: Bila Dah Sayang
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Kamarudin yang tak jadi bertunang dengan Tengku Suraya kerana kekasihnya itu masih belum bersedia untuk berkahwin. Dalam hati mereka masih ada perasaan sayang antara satu sama lain walaupun mereka sering bertengkar. Namun berlaku satu insiden yang membuatkan Kamarudin terpikat dengan seorang gadis Cina bernama Miss Yap.

programme.title: Puteri Impian 2
programme.desc: Gadis kilang yang menolak lamaran seorang kerabat diraja Tengku Faizal, menaruh hati terhadap jurukamera stesen televisyen, Zul. Nora menyukai Zul tetapi dia telah pun menjalin hubungan bersama Lisa. Adik kepada Tengku Faizal, Tengku Farid ingin membawa semula Nora kembali ke abangnya. Tekad, dia ingin mengangkat semula maruah abangnya.

programme.title: Jom Camping Ep1
programme.desc: Program travelog yang meneroka pelbagai bentuk dan jenis perkhemahan berbeza selain berjalan ke lokasilokasi perkhemahan di negeri Sarawak bersama dua anak jati Sarawak, El Baharin dan Anaz Zawawi.

programme.title: (L) TVS Sana Sini
programme.desc: A local perspective on international and domestic affairs, TVS Sana Sini offers concise news stories alongside the Weather Report, providing a look at climate and environmental conditions affecting the country.

programme.title: (L) Badminton Asia Mixed Championship 2025
programme.desc: The Badminton Asia Mixed Team Championship 2025 gathers top Asian nations in an intense battle for supremacy. Featuring singles and doubles across mens and womens categories, teams compete for regional glory!

programme.desc: The love and sacrifice of a mother is most apparent at the moment of separation. After celebrating Chinese New Year, Xiao Bao and his mother are forced to be torn apart only one will return.

programme.title: (DL) TVS Highlight

programme.title: Endless Love S2 Ep91
programme.desc: Two separate worlds, both close and distant to each other, lie in a seaside neighbourhood of Istanbul. Two young people from these separate worlds fall in love.

programme.title: (DL) TVS Terkini
programme.desc: Terkini TVS brings the latest breaking news, offering quick and essential updates from both within the country and around the globe.

programme.title: Hantu The Musical Ep7
programme.desc: Four friends realize an old house, Teratak Kelana, is related to the spate of disappearances that have been occurring. They investigate & find it haunted by the spirit of its dead owner, The Old Pawang.

programme.title: (L) Berita Wilayah TVS
programme.desc: Berita Wilayah TVS membawakan berita dari negeri-negeri di seluruh negara.

programme.title: The Food That Binds Series Ep4
programme.desc: Sebuah dokumentari kembara gastronomi yang merentas dari Perlis ke Sarawak, memperkenalkan keunikan juadah berbilang budaya yang memupuk perpaduan dalam kepelbagaian selera.

programme.title: (L) Re Bao
programme.desc: Re Bao memaparkan berita-berita terkini di seluruh Malaysia dalam bahasa Mandarin

programme.title: Weaving And Craft Ep1
programme.desc: Exploring the vibrant world of traditional handicrafts and textiles, showcasing the living culture, identity, and heritage within Sarawak's rich diversity.

programme.title: HITS! Ep13
programme.desc: Rancangan infotainment HITS adalah program 30 minit/episod setiap minggu yang menghadirkan berita, tren, dan kisah-kisah menarik dari dunia hiburan.

programme.title: Ehsan Love Story
programme.desc: Seorang lelaki tampan bernama Sian yang berasal dari Utara Thailand. Sian dibesarkan oleh ibunya selepas kematian bapanya. Sian yang baru habis belajar menunggu kepulangan teman wanitanya bernama Som yang belajar di Bangkok.

programme.title: Mock 2 For 3
programme.desc: Abang dan kakak mencipta model mainan baru dan cuba membentangkan di syarikat komersial, tetapi gagal. Id adalah pengganti syarikat, baru pulang dari Jepun.

programme.title: Balasan Untuk Ayah Dzalim
programme.desc: (Toni) Ayah kepada Rahma, menganggap bahawa Rahma sebagai anak pembawa malang. Ini kerana isterinya meninggal dunia saat melahirkan Rahma. Walaupun begitu, Rahma tetap hormat kepada ayahnnya.

programme.title: Tmo Syawal Yang Hilang
programme.desc: Saksikan di sebalik tabir pembikinan Filem Syawal Yang Hilang

programme.title: Geng Van Jenazah
programme.desc: Husin merupakan pemandu van jenazah bersahabat baik dengan Mail. Suatu hari Husin menerima panggilan untuk mengambil jenazah Pak Tam yang meninggal dunia akibat makan durian. Husin dan Mail dikehendaki menghantar jenazah Pak Tam ke kampung asalnya. Dalam perjalanan menghantar Pak Tam ke kampung asalnya, Mail menerima panggilan daripada kekasihnya, Sharifah yang ingin berjumpa kerana dipaksa bertunang dengan orang lain. Kerana kesuntukan masa Sharifah dibawa bersama, dan mereka menggunakan jalan pintas. Macam-macam hal dan kejadian berlaku.

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep2
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: I Miss You
programme.desc: Bee jatuh cinta dengan rakan sekerja pakar bedah kanannya. Tetapi teman wanitanya yang baru-baru ini meninggal dunia dalam kemalangan masih belum bersedia untuk menyerahkannya lagi.

programme.title: Jodoh Dari The Power Of Emak - Emak
programme.desc: Danang & Maya berpura-pura berpacaran di hadapan ibu bapa mereka sambil mencari jalan untuk membatalkan perkahwinan yang diatur ini.

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep7
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Family Life Lope Bangat
programme.desc: Mengisahkan tentang Tara dan Niko merupakan pasangan muda yang berjaya. Namun setelah menikah tiga tahun, mereka belum juga dikaruniai anak.

programme.title: Tayangan Perdana 11 Cinta Sebelum Kamu
programme.desc: Ray, selepas melamar Khadeja, Ray bertemu bakal ibu mentuanya, Dato' Shikin, seorang ibu tunggal dan peguam terkenal. Tanpa mengetahui latar belakang keluarga Khadeja, Ray mendapati bahawa Dato' Shikin telah menyelidik kehidupan masa lalunya yang 'nakal. Demi mendapatkan restu bagi mengahwini Khadeja, Dato Shikin telah menetapkan satu syarat, Ray perlu berdepan dan meminta maaf kepada kesemua 11 bekas teman wanitanya, merakam setiap kemaafan yang diberikan kepada Ray, dan menghantarnya kepada Dato' Shikin dalam tempoh 30 hari. Terdesak, Ray bersetuju dengan syarat tersebut dan meminta bantuan rakan baiknya, Kamil. Misi menjadi rumit apabila Ray dan Kamil mendapati bekas-bekas teman wanitanya, pesakit mental, jurulatih MMA, pegawai polis narkotik, barista kafe, penjaga zoo, pengusaha makanan dan pelbagai lagi, kesemuanya masih marah dengan Ray, terutamanya Aisha, kenalan rapat Ray dari bangku sekolah yang juga kononnya salah seorang dari 11 orang bekas kekasih Ray. Kali terakhir Ray bertemu dengan Aisha adalah 13 tahun lepas. Aisha menyedari bahawa Ray benar-benar telah berubah dan memutuskan untuk membantu Ray menyelesaikan misinya. Ray dan Aisha secara tidak diduga mula jatuh hati antara satu sama lain. Perasaan yang sama dirasai mereka 13 tahun lepas namun dipendam sehingga kini. Tanpa pengetahuan Ray, Dato' Shikin telah mengupah seseorang yang rapat dengan Ray untuk menggagalkan misinya. Masa 30 hari kian hampir tamat, dan Aisha merupakan orang yang terakhir dalam misi Ray untuk memohon kemaafan.

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep3
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Playboy Dimindaku
programme.desc: Kisah Farid mempunyai banyak personaliti dan kekasih. Dia menggunakan personalitinya untuk berdepan dengan masalah dengan cara membiarkan personalitinya yang lain mengambil alih kekosongan yang dia tinggalkan itu.

programme.title: Berkah Di Akhir Hayat Anakku
programme.desc: Sejak Putri disambar kilat, dia sering melihat perkara ghaib dan boleh melihat sesuatu perkara yang akan terjadi. Bagaimanakah kisah Putri selanjutnya?

programme.title: Pad Thai
programme.desc: Petchara, seorang penjual pad thai di pasar, menyertai pertandingan makan Pad-thai untuk memenangi harga satu juta baht. Dia mempunyai ramai pesaing yang bersedia untuk menang. Salah seorang daripada mereka ialah bekas teman lelakinya, Surachart, yang tidak mahu kehilangannya lagi. Dan Suchat, seorang guru muda yang merupakan jirannya yang mempunyai ramai peminat di kampungnya dan ramai pemuda top di kampungnya adalah tip untuk memenangi pertandingan ini. Perlumbaan untuk mencapai kemenangan bukanlah mudah.

programme.title: Variety Jom Wayang S13 Ep11
programme.desc: Anda kaki wayang? Hos Elyssa Alia membawakan anda informasi menarik bagi filem-filem terpilih tempatan dan luar negara dengan cara yang berbeza yang pastinya akan membuat anda ketawa dan santai sambil menonton Jom Wayang

programme.title: Momzillas
programme.desc: Clara dan Minerva, dua wanita yang pernah berkongsi lelaki yang sama, bertemu semula apabila anak-anak mereka memutuskan untuk berkahwin antara satu sama lain. Konflik mereka semakin memuncak apabila mereka terperangkap di pulau yang jauh.

programme.title: Bayang
programme.desc: Mengisahkan tentang kehilangan Lisa, seorang penyiasat yang menjadi misteri kerana berkait rapat dengan kes-kes pembunuhan yang sedang disiasatnya bersama seorang rakannya, Azam. Seorang jurugambar amatur bernama Joni, menjadi petunjuk kepada misteri kehilangan Lisa.

programme.desc: Boon-um dan Pude adalah kawan rapat. Di kawasan kejiranan terdapat seorang gadis cantik bernama Michell yang Boon-um sangat suka tetapi akan menyembunyikan dan memerhatikannya apabila dia berlalu. Jadi Pude dan rakan-rakan membuat rancangan nakal untuk membantu Boon-um yang dia boleh berjumpa dengan Michell.

programme.title: Restu Ayah
programme.desc: Kisah Azlan yang terlalu dimanjakan ibu bapanya, sehinggakan sifatnya yang suka dipuji terbawa di dalam kehidupan sehariannya bersama jiran-jiran dan juga di sekolah. Kebahagiaan ini dapat dilihat di rumah dan disekolah apabila segala aktiviti serta kelakuan Azlan yang suka menuntut pujian itu disenangi oleh kawan-kawan serta guru dan ibu bapanya. Situasi ini menjadikan Azlan seorang yang sering diberi tumpuan oleh kawan-kawan, guru, jiran-jiran dan ibu bapanya.

programme.title: Playboy Dimindaku
programme.desc: Kisah Farid mempunyai banyak personaliti dan kekasih. Dia menggunakan personalitinya untuk berdepan dengan masalah dengan cara membiarkan personalitinya yang lain mengambil alih kekosongan yang dia tinggalkan itu.

programme.title: Doyan Makan Ep52
programme.desc: Doyan Makan menjemput penonton untuk mengikuti perjalanan dan pengalaman kulinari untuk makanan popular di kawasan tersebut, serta akan meninjau informasi tentang tempat, harga dan proses penghasilan makanan yang mereka nikmati.

programme.title: The Sultan S2 Ep42
programme.desc: The Sultan adalah rancangan bual bicara yang menampilkan dua pengacara yang kaya bak Sultan, iaitu Sultan Andara-Raffi Ahmad dan Sultan Bintaro-Andre Taulany dan ditemani oleh pengawal yang cantik dan tampan. Rancangan ini turut menampilkan bintang-bintang tetamu Indonesia yang terkenal.

programme.title: Makan Terooos Ep19
programme.desc: Jelajahi kekayaan masakan yang menampilkan rasa autentik. Sertai kami dalam pengembaraan rasa di seluruh Indonesia, hanya di Makan Terooos, di mana setiap hidangan memiliki kisahnya sendiri.

programme.title: Tolong Naikin Gaji Asisten Pembantu Cintanya
programme.desc: Berkisah tentang seorang gadis cantik bernama Santi. Santi sanggup melakukan apa saja, asalkan halal, untuk menyara keluarganya. Pada awalnya, kehidupan Santi adalah biasa-biasa sahaja, sehingga suatu hari, dia tiba-tiba mula menawarkan khidmat sebagai orang serba boleh. Santi kemudian mendapat pekerjaan untuk membantu Raza kembali bersama bekas kekasihnya.

programme.title: Semarak Indosiar 2021 Ep21
programme.desc: Kemeriahan pentas Indosiar tetap hadir dengan keindahan budaya Indonesia dalam rancangan Indosiar Semarak 2021. Iringi malam anda dengan persembahan yang menakjubkan daripada artis serta penyanyi dari ibu kota.

programme.title: Cinta Setelah Cinta S2 Ep42
programme.desc: Starla menyangka dia telah menghadapi segalanya, tetapi penipuan Niko jauh lebih mendalam daripada yang disangkanya. Ketika dia terus berusaha mempertahankan perkahwinannya, ancaman baharu muncul. Ayu, yang masih taksub dengan Niko, semakin mengikatnya dalam perangkap dengan menggunakan anak mereka yang belum lahir sebagai umpan. Pada masa yang sama, naluri Starla merasakan ada sesuatu yang tidak kena, dan dia mula diburu oleh bayang-bayang serta rahsia gelap. Dengan keluarganya di ambang bahaya dan emosinya semakin tertekan, adakah Starla mampu melindungi orang-orang tersayang? Atau adakah pengkhianatan Niko akan mendorongnya melangkaui batas yang tidakbolehkembali?

programme.title: Jatim Traveler Ep6
programme.desc: Jatim Traveler membawa anda mengembara menerokai keunikan kulinari, keindahan destinasi pelancongan, dan tradisi istimewa di serata pelosok Jawa Timur.

programme.title: Bidadari Surgamu Ep168
programme.desc: Menceritakan kisah seorang gadis bernama Sakinah yang menjalani kehidupan penuh tekanan akibat fitnah dan dipaksa untuk berkahwin dengan seseorang yang tidak mencintainya. Tidak hanya itu, Sakinah juga dihalang untuk mengetahui siapa ibu kandungnya yang tega membuangnya.

programme.title: Cinta Abang Somay Endingnya di Luar Nalar
programme.desc: Julian dan Kevin berebut untuk mewarisi harta pusaka datuk mereka, tetapi dengan syarat. Salah satu daripada mereka mesti memenangi hati seorang wanita bernama Debby.

programme.title: Ungkap Hikmah Di Balik Dosa Ep6
programme.desc: Ungkap Hikmah Di Balik Dosa adalah sebuah rancangan yang menilai kejadian atau peristiwa dari perspektif Islam, mengungkap hikmah di sebalik dosa.

programme.title: Suster El Ep6
programme.desc: Kisah seorang gadis yatim piatu bernama Elnara yang tinggal bersama kakaknya, Resti. Demi memenuhi impian Nara untuk menjadi jururawat, Resti bekerja keras. Hingga suatu hari, Resti bertemu dengan seorang lelaki kaya bernama Verdi dan mereka akhirnya menikah. Nara sangat gembira kerana perkahwinan Resti membawa kehidupan yang lebih baik untuk mereka, tetapi kegembiraan Nara berakhir seketika apabila dia menemui sesuatu yang menggoncangkan dunianya dan mengancam untuk memisahkan keluarganya.

programme.title: Cinta Setelah Cinta S2 Ep42
programme.desc: Starla menyangka dia telah menghadapi segalanya, tetapi penipuan Niko jauh lebih mendalam daripada yang disangkanya. Ketika dia terus berusaha mempertahankan perkahwinannya, ancaman baharu muncul. Ayu, yang masih taksub dengan Niko, semakin mengikatnya dalam perangkap dengan menggunakan anak mereka yang belum lahir sebagai umpan. Pada masa yang sama, naluri Starla merasakan ada sesuatu yang tidak kena, dan dia mula diburu oleh bayang-bayang serta rahsia gelap. Dengan keluarganya di ambang bahaya dan emosinya semakin tertekan, adakah Starla mampu melindungi orang-orang tersayang? Atau adakah pengkhianatan Niko akan mendorongnya melangkaui batas yang tidakbolehkembali?

programme.title: Cinta Abang Somay Endingnya di Luar Nalar
programme.desc: Julian dan Kevin berebut untuk mewarisi harta pusaka datuk mereka, tetapi dengan syarat. Salah satu daripada mereka mesti memenangi hati seorang wanita bernama Debby.

programme.title: Bidadari Surgamu Ep170

programme.title: Babe Kabur Pulang Bawa Mantu Direktur
programme.desc: Galang memilih untuk pergi dari rumah dan tinggal di rumah sewa milik keluarga Nia. Sejak pertemuan pertama mereka, Nia dan Galang sering bertengkar, namun lama-kelamaan timbul perasaan di hati mereka.

programme.title: Konser Luar Biasa Karya Emas 24 Musisi Ep1
programme.desc: Mempersembahkan Konser Luar Biasa Karya Emas 24 Musisi yang menampilkan kolaborasi lima band terkenal tanah air iaitu Kotak, Five Minutes, Armada, Wali dan Repvblik bersama bintang dangdut seperti Inul Daratista, Lesty DA, Fildan DA, Rara LIDA, Selfi LIDA dan Tasya Rosmala. Saksikan gabungan muzik pop dan dangdut dalam persembahan luar biasa ini.

programme.title: A Man Of Reason
programme.desc: After being released from prison, a man learns that he has a daughter, thus wishes to leave the gangs and live an ordinary life. Yet the new leader of the gangs feels being betrayed...

programme.title: Love Reset
programme.desc: A couple decide to divorce after two years of marriage. They revive a 30-day divorce settlement period from the court, but then they both lost memories after a car accident...

programme.title: Stellar: A Magical Ride
programme.desc: Chasing after a supercar in his father's beat-up Stellar, while being come after by local gangsters, Young Bae jog memories of his father bit by bit.

programme.title: My Worst Neighbor
programme.desc: In a house with little soundproofing, a man and a woman living next door started a noise war. They then cohabitate through the wall, and catching up in subtle emotions...

programme.title: Pilot
programme.desc: Han Jung-woo is a popular star pilot. He is unable to work in any company due to a momentary mistake. He later gets a job with his sister's identity but his new job is soon threatened.

programme.title: Countdown
programme.desc: A debt collector has liver cancer and has to get a liver transplant in 10 days. A seductive swindler agrees to donate her liver only if he tracks down the man who put her in prison.

programme.title: Midnight
programme.desc: Kyung-mi with hearing impairment trying to save another girl from a killer becomes the prey herself. As the killer gains trust from the police, a life-threatening chase begins...

programme.title: Handsome Guys
programme.desc: Self-proclaimed tough guy Jae-Pil and sexy guy Sang-Gu move to a countryside home. A spirit sealed in the basement awakens, leading to a high-stimulus chilling comedy they'll never forget.

programme.title: Killing Romance
programme.desc: As a popular actress has growing discontentment towards her marriage, she begins planning to kill her rich husband with her neighbor.

programme.title: Taeyong: Ty Track In Cinemas
programme.desc: Taeyong is the first NCT member to make a solo debut. He released a mini album and held a 2-day concert. Witness his outstanding performance and take a closer look at him behind the stage.

programme.title: Memories Of The Sword
programme.desc: 3 warriors pledge to fight against an incompetent king. However, a betrayal occurs leading to the death of one of the warriors. 18 years later, the daughter of the betrayed sets out to get revenge.

programme.title: Actionhero
programme.desc: A college student dreaming to be an action star discovered an admission fraud. He decided to make an action film of him against the corrupted professor.

programme.title: The Night Owl
programme.desc: A blind acupuncturist, who strangely, is able to see normally at night, happens to witness the death of the crown prince.

programme.title: Unforgettable
programme.desc: A radio DJ receives a letter written 23 years ago in the past. Through the letter, the story of his first love and friendships of five friends are revealed.

programme.title: Bear Man
programme.desc: Two bears from the Institute of techonolgy have turned into humans after eating garlic and mugwort. Yet, one has grown up into a police, while one has become a gangster...

programme.title: Dr. Cheon And The Lost Talisman
programme.desc: Dr. Cheon is a fake exorcist who cannot see or hear any ghosts. One day, a woman comes to Dr. Cheon, asking him to save her possessed younger sister.

programme.title: Deranged
programme.desc: A pharmaceutical salesman races against time to save his family when they start to exhibit symptoms of a fatal outbreak that had been causing an epidemic of drownings.

programme.title: Going By The Book
programme.desc: Things get out of control when an eager traffic cop who tends to do things by the book was chosen to act as a bank robber in a drill.

programme.title: Love Reset
programme.desc: A couple decide to divorce after two years of marriage. They revive a 30-day divorce settlement period from the court, but then they both lost memories after a car accident...

programme.title: The Childe
programme.desc: A Kopino boxer goes to Korea to search for his estranged father for his mother's surgery, but his surroundings have turned into a mess after he met a mysterious man known as "Nobleman"...

programme.title: The Tiger
programme.desc: While the Kingdom of Korea is under occupation by the Japanese, an old and experienced hunter is challenged by the hunt of the last tiger in the country.

programme.title: Cafe Midnight
programme.desc: Yoon went searching for her groom Taeyoung who didn't show up on the wedding day. She arrives at a strange place called 'Cafe Midnight' by chance and found a younger Taeyoung from the past.

programme.title: A Taxi Driver
programme.desc: A widowed father and taxi driver takes a German reporter from Seoul to Gwangju to cover the 1980 uprising.

programme.title: I (2021)
programme.desc: Ah-Young who grew up in an orphanage becomes the babysitter of Young-Chae, who is raising a 6-month-old child on her own. One day, her child has an accident and she places all the blame on Ah-Young...

programme.title: Super Mom Ep3
programme.desc: Mums and experts are invited to share their personal experiences and interpretation on parenting. The program aims to relieve the anxiety of parents by providing the latest, most comprehensive and sincere parenting information.

programme.title: New Chinese Dating Event Season 6 Ep1
programme.desc: Celebrities are invited to join and reveal their experience and love stories in Season Six to help the guests to find true love. The show aims to interpret youngsters views on marriage and love through discussion among different generation.

programme.title: Maybe You Are Falling In Love Ep12
programme.desc: With a one-day time limit, male and female guests gather in three everyday life scenes to connect with and understand each other. Breaking the typical dating show format, host Zhang Chunye and the ""Support Team"" (Jam Hsiao, Dazhang Wei, Pu Yixing, Cai Guoqing, and Wang Yaoqing) witness the growing emotions between guests, accompanying them through the sweetness and setbacks of their emotional journey.

programme.title: Travel With The Royal Family Ep6
programme.desc: Reunited for the first time in thirteen years were Ada Choi, Tao Xin-ran, Xi Lan, Zhang Xiao-long, Lan Ying-ying, Chen Si-si, and Yang Jiu-lang. Beginning from Daguanyuan in Beijing, the filming location of the top-leading drama "Empresses in the Palace", they traveled to various ethnic cultural origins. Through in-depth exploration and study, they experienced the local customs and culture, carrying with them both nostalgic memories and new aspirations, completing their "Rejuvenation Journey" across China.

programme.title: Mystery In The Box Ep3
programme.desc: All-celebrities immersive storyline experience variety show; revolving around the elements of gaming and comedy, it is based on current social hot topics to create different game themes. In a boxed space, a group of mysterious players need to gradually uncover the truth of the story through various bizarre, hilarious, and twisted situations, break free from the box, and embark on a unique journey of spiritual healing.

programme.title: Go! Grand Canal Ep5
programme.desc: The Grand Canal, a world heritage site, will be explored from various perspectives, including history, politics, culture, and economics, highlighting its spiritual values and contributions to Chinese nation's history and culture.

programme.title: Singing With Legends Season 4 (Repackaged) Ep12
programme.desc: The show has served as a bridge that connects veteran and young singers via various popular songs. Priscilla Chan, Yang Kun, Steve Chou, Qi Zhang, Jam Hsiao, An Youqi, Lu Hu, Hui Yuan Meng, Ma Jiaqi, etc. are invited for the pairing section. They all raised audiences interest by introducing unexpected changes to the way music that performed.

programme.title: Hello Macao! I am from 1999
programme.desc: This narrative highlights the lives of young people from Macau and mainland China in fields such as technology, culture, and business, focusing on two individuals: one migrating to Macau and the other to mainland China, both sharing their experiences and struggles.

programme.title: Gung Hay Fat Choy (M) Ep38
programme.desc: In a bad economy, many people dream of becoming rich overnight, especially the Jiang family. Mother Jiang pushes her three children to earn money so that they can one day live in luxury. Even her daughter-in-law wishes for the same thing. She hopes that one day she can visit her parents with the money that spills out of her purse.

programme.title: 100% Wife (T) Ep229
programme.desc: Three generations of the Jin family live under one roof. Mrs. Jin-Ke mei-man has two sons, You-Tsai and You-De. You-Tsai abandoned the family many years ago, leaving his wife Siou-Ying to shoulder the huge responsibility of the Jin family business selling fish products at market. Although Siou-Ying was betrayed by You-Tsai, she has still been a dutiful daughter to her mother-in-law, and has single-mindedly raised four children.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep5044
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation.

programme.title: The Fierce Wife
programme.desc: An Zhen divorces her husband after his infidelity but faces a pivotal decision four years later - to return to her cheating husband and old life or to embark on a new life with a new love?

programme.title: Mission Milano
programme.desc: A wealthy entrepreneur goes undercover with an Interpol agent to protect a new invention, the Seed of God, from falling into an international crime conglomerate.

programme.title: CJ7
programme.desc: Stephen Chow returns in this hilarious and heartwarming tale of a father and son who discover an adorable alien in the trash.

programme.title: Where The Wind Blows
programme.desc: Founded in the 70s, Hong Kongs ICAC is committed to fight corruption in the police force. Detectives Lui Lok and Nam Kong build a corruption system that creates conflicts between the triad and the police. When ICAC hunts down the two, their control finally comes to an end. Where the wind blows, Hong Kong is no longer what it used to be!

programme.title: The Monkey is Back
programme.desc: The savior of the people, Stone Monkey, has given hope to a desperate little girl which he promises to realize. Years later, Stone Monkey is defeated in a battle with the three-eyed God of War, causing him to lose his power and falls into the mortal world. Can he fulfill his promise to the girl and stop the God of Wood from destroying earth?

programme.title: Protege
programme.desc: Undercover Police Nick has spent 8 years working for the drug baron Quin, so as to collect evidence of his drug trafficking activities. After gaining Quins trust, Nick becomes his protg and succeeds him as the drug baron when Quin retires. However, Nick has lost himself in his split life between trading drugs and searching for criminal evidence.

programme.title: Chilli Laugh Story
programme.desc: Coba is forced to work at home during COVID-19 and fights with his family every day. He decides to turn his mothers chilli sauce into a trendy commodity to keep his family occupied. With his mother, father and aunt making the chilli sauce together, the family sells it online and the business grows beyond their imagination.

programme.title: My Kickass Wife
programme.desc: Jade is a beautiful royal guard who is set up for marriage by the Queen in order to avoid the King setting eyes on her. Jade falls for Sean and helps him win the contest for her. After the wedding, Sean discovers her bad temper and visits a brothel in his despair. He meets and is attracted to a girl there, not knowing she has a secret agenda...

programme.title: May We Chat
programme.desc: Yan, Wei Wei and Yi Ji are three troubled young women from very different backgrounds who met on We Chat, a social media platform, and will do anything to escape each of their troubled lives. When Yan suddenly disappears one day, Wei Wei and Yi Ji start to track her whereabouts, only to find out shocking truths about her that were never revealed.

programme.title: Over My Dead Body
programme.desc: This dark comedy begins with an unidentified corpse appearing at the doorstep of a residential flat. Fearing that the corpse will turn their flats into "haunted flats", which will cause a drastic drop in the property value, the four families living on the same floor attempt to move the corpse away, embroiling themselves in chaos.

programme.title: Men Suddenly in Love
programme.desc: Five high-school alumni - councilor Ng Yuk Yan, actor Cheung Chau Wan, gynecologist Fu Mo Sum, feng shui master Szeto Kei Fung, and dance coach Charlie Lam - get together to throw a birthday party for their respected teacher Mr. Chu, who enlightened them about the birds and the bees. Five delectable young models appear at the party, during which the 80-year-old educator gets too excited and unfortunately kicks the bucket - but not before telling his pupils to fulfill his last wish and get a little naughty! The quintet of married men then takes it upon themselves to conquer the babes, all the while trying to evade the watchful eye of their wives.

programme.title: One More Chance
programme.desc: Chow Yun Fat stars as a down-on-his-luck gambler, Water, whose ex-girlfriend asked him to take care of their autistic son. As Water lives with his son, he soon finds his goal in life. When he discovers his sons talent in running, Water decides to give up his dissipated life and support his son to achieve his dream.

programme.title: The Invisible Guest
programme.desc: Young and beautiful entrepreneur Joanna is a prime suspect in a locked-room murder where her lover is found dead. She pays off a police officer to prove her innocence. During the investigation, they discover another murder case involving Joanna and her lover, and eventually reveals the truth.

programme.title: Ashes of Time Redux
programme.desc: After his beloved woman married his brother, Ou Yang Feng moves to the desert to run an inn and becomes a killer agent. He makes acquaintance of different people with their different stories ... The movie is the winner of the 1st Hong Kong Film Critics Society Awards for Best Film, Best Director, Best Screenplay and Best Actor (Leslie Cheung).

programme.title: The Italian Recipe
programme.desc: Famous pop idol Peng travels to Rome for a reality show and encounters an ordinary girl, Mang, who dreams of becoming a great chef after migrating to Italy. Peng and Mang have nothing in common but spend a magical night in Rome together. Their lives begin to change as the two start to fall in love.

programme.title: The Sparring Partner
programme.desc: Adapted from a sensational 2013 parricide in Hong Kong, a young man partners with his friend to murder and dismember his parents. Pleading not guilty, the defendants play the devil and idiot game, while the defense attorneys turn on each other. Meanwhile, heated debates emerge inside the jury room, where nine jurors grapple with the truth.

programme.title: Soul Mate
programme.desc: July and An Sheng have been best friends since they were thirteen. They always believed their friendship would last forever, until they meet Su Jia Ming at the age of eighteen. The trio find themselves in a love triangle, which puts the girls friendship to the test and alters their destinies.

programme.title: The Fatal Raid
programme.desc: Twenty years after a deadly bloodbath between the Hong Kong Police and Macau gangsters, Madam Fong, the surviving team member, leads a new squad of four policewomen across borders to pursue young anarchists terrorizing Macau in a mission to protect the Hong Kong Polices Deputy Chief Commissioner.

programme.title: Song of Spring
programme.desc: An 85-year-old mother lives with her 65-year-old daughter who is suffering from Alzheimer's disease, causing her to suffer a decline in memory, mental confusion and disorientation. Though the elderly mother has to shoulder the burden of a caregiver, she still wants to be with her daughter forever.

programme.title: PTU
programme.desc: When OCTB (Organized Crime And Triad Bureau) officer, Sergeant Lo Sa, loses his police revolver to four triad young thugs, he seeks help from Sergeant Mike Ho of the PTU (Police Tactical Unit) to find his lost revolver. Ho and his patrolling PTU team has until dawn to recover the gun and clean up the mess.

programme.title: Far Far Away
programme.desc: A 28-year-old IT geek has only been in love once. Surprisingly, he ends up getting romantically involved with five different women this year and the one thing they have in common is that they all live in far flung areas of Hong Kong. After taking five intensive relationship courses within these 365 days, will he find the-one?

programme.title: Maoshan Heavenly Master
programme.desc: Prisoner Chi flees away under Master Zhangs custody, causing the latter to be expelled from his clan. On his way to find Chi, Master Zhang arrives at a place where many people vanish for no reason. He soon discovers that it is Chi who captures them in his training to become a serpent demon. The war between human and demon has just begun!

programme.title: The Silent War
programme.desc: After the Chinese Civil War, 701 Bureau continues to monitor the coded transmissions between rebel forces. When radio frequencies used by the opponent disappear suddenly, Agent Zhang asks Ho, a blind piano tuner with exceptional hearing, to help find the transmission signals. Can Ho find the missing signals and foil a possible assassination plot?

programme.title: Crypto Storm
programme.desc: ICAC investigation officer Lok sets up a special team to investigate a corruption case involving a banks top executives use of cryptocurrency to manipulate the trading market. When the banks chairman is kidnapped and kidnappers demand ransom in crypto coins, Lok connects the dots and vows to hunt down the mastermind behind both crimes.

programme.title: I Fine… Thank You… Love You
programme.desc: Pleng, an English tutor, helps her student to pass a break up message in English to her boyfriend Gym. Gym knows nothing about English but wants to win back his girlfriend from the US, so he asks Pleng to teach him. Boorish and a slow learner, Gym makes many hilarious mistakes when learning English and ends up falling for Pleng.

programme.title: Mad Fate
programme.desc: A Master fortune teller predicts that Tung, a born psychopath, will be imprisoned for murder and tries to change his fate. A veteran detective believes Tung is a psychopathic serial killer after witnessing him kill a cat, and pursues him relentlessly. Can the Master change Tungs mad fate?

programme.title: Treasure Hunt
programme.desc: A commercial director Peggy shoots an ad on a deserted island while some mysterious men with the treasure map are also there to hunt for the hidden Ming Dynasty treasures. However, the map is stolen by Star who lives on the island. Star and Peggy unveil the hidden treasures but end up being chased by the mysterious men

programme.title: Find Your Voice
programme.desc: The passion choir pilot program trains students from three underperforming schools choir to participate in an inter-school choral competition. While it seems impossible, a renowned conductor, Yim Tsz Long, unexpectedly agrees to lead the choir. Will the passion choir and Maestro Yim complete this impossible mission and win the competition?

programme.title: Divergence
programme.desc: Three men are going beyond what their jobs require them to do. An ill-fated police detective runs into a woman during his investigation on a money laundering case, a lawyer protects a corrupt businessman from law and a ruthless killer violates his code to get involved in a police investigation. These three men are thrown together by circumstance...

programme.title: Better Days
programme.desc: In this Oscar nominee for Best International Feature Film, Nian faces relentless bullying from her peers as she prepares for her college entrance exam. Fate leads her to streetwise punk Bei, but before they can retreat into their own world, both are embroiled in a murder investigation that will change their lives forever.

programme.title: Happy Dragons
programme.desc: Four retired secret agents embark on a quest for the "Golden Relic" triggered by a mahjong game. Their journey unexpectedly transports them back 30 years, restoring their youth. While striving to rectify their past mistakes, the agents unravel a hidden conspiracy along the way.

programme.title: Young and Dangerous: Reloaded
programme.desc: In this remake of Young and Dangerous, Chan Ho Nam and his three buddies of the Hung Hing triad gang strive to fight for their own justice, further expanding their power in the triad and becoming a new legend...

programme.title: The Fierce Wife
programme.desc: An Zhen divorces her husband after his infidelity but faces a pivotal decision four years later - to return to her cheating husband and old life or to embark on a new life with a new love?

programme.title: The Rebel Intruders
programme.desc: Thousands of displaced refugees rush to the southern towns to avoid the civil war in north China. Three such young men trained with martial arts skills become sworn brothers, and accidentally got involved in the battle of the rebel leaders in town when they save a refugee girl. Can they fight back against the rebel gangs?

programme.title: The Perfumed Arrow
programme.desc: A charming Huangmei Opera title, this is the story of Fei E, a Generals daughter who grows up fooling everyone that she is a boy, including her two closest schoolmates. When she has to choose one of them to marry, how will Fei E tell them that she is a girl? To complicate matters, a girl who Fei E saves one day only wants to be married to her!

programme.title: The Love Eterne
programme.desc: Ying Tai disguises herself as a boy to go to school and falls hopelessly in love with her classmate, Shan Bo. After Shan Bo realizes her true identity, he proposes marriage to Ying Tai. However, they are kept apart as she is engaged to another man. Knowing Shan Bo died in despair, Ying Tai is in deep sorrow and kills herself at his grave.

programme.title: Scandal
programme.desc: The roguish scamp Zhen and his best friend Chia collects proof of corruption from the officials in this comedy-drama. After a string of blackmailing, they end up in positions of power, but what is to happen next?

programme.title: Legendary Weapons of China
programme.desc: Lei Kung, the leader of the Boxer Clan in Yunnan, dissolves the clan to save his disciples before going into self-exile. The Clan sends various assassins to kill him but failed. They then assigned Kungs brother Yong to find and kill Kung, leading to a battle between the two brothers.

programme.title: Pale Passion
programme.desc: Fa is an obsessive man who loves his wife Ah Hsia but is easily jealous and abuses her. When she leaves him one day, Fa hooks up with another woman, Hsing. A deadly triangle develops when Fa runs into Ah Hsia again and decides to win her back

programme.title: Dirty Ho
programme.desc: Master Wang, who is actually the 11th prince, poses as an antique connoisseur to hide his true identity. When he meets Dirty Ho, a witty con artist, Wang knows he has found the right man to help him untangle a royal succession plot...

programme.title: Oath Of Death
programme.desc: Three Sung loyalists become blood brothers to fight the tyranny of the Tartar invaders. To oust the oppressors altogether, Ma releases the kidnapped Tartar princess in a strategic effort to gain points with the invaders, but it soon becomes apparent that he desires both a great position and power, and will do anything to get it

programme.title: Twin Blades Of Doom
programme.desc: A retired martial artist is forced to return with a vengeance after his family and friends are murdered by the evil Ghost Gang. He decides to challenge the gangs leader to a deadly duel so as to take revenge. Can he defeat the ruthless leader in the end?

programme.title: Rose, Be My Love
programme.desc: Not a love triangle but a love 'rectangle', Rose, Be My Love is a romantic drama set on the eve of World War II that represents the high standards achieved by Shaw Brothers in both aspects of star power and technical polish.

programme.title: Brave Archer And His Mate
programme.desc: Guo Jing and Huang Rong raise the son of his sworn brother Yang Kang and named him Yang Guo. To prevent Yang Guo from taking revenge for his fathers death, Huang Rong bans him from learning martial arts. Yang Guo runs away from home in anger and encounters Ouyang Feng, who teaches him the Toad Stance and accidentally unveils his true identity

programme.title: A Maid From Heaven
programme.desc: The seventh daughter of the Jade Emperor is banished from heaven to live a mortal life as she is very mischievous. She falls in love with a young village lad Yong, who sold himself to work for the rich so as to bury his father. The goddess sisters help Yong to pay his debt so the lovebirds can be together. Is this going to end happily-ever-after?

programme.title: Sons Of Good Earth
programme.desc: This is an epic tale set during the time of the Sino-Japanese war. A painter Yu saves a young girl, Lotus, who is being sold to a brothel. They fall in love, get married and settled in to a peaceful life. However, their life is soon shattered by the Japanese invasion and the brutal regime that follows...

programme.title: Perils Of The Sentimental Swordsman
programme.desc: The titanic team of Director Chu Yuan and Novelist Ku Lung chose to give their hero (Ti Lung) a whole new cliffhanger-fraught adventure featuring a mysterious swordsman, a sensual swordswoman, an imperial assassin, a ghost mansion, a booby-trapped tunnel, as well as double crosses and secret missions.

programme.title: The Scandalous Warlord
programme.desc: General Feng occupies the city of Shandong, and soldiers and civilians alike welcome him without knowing his tyrannical and lustful nature. His first official business is to inspect the brothels and take the prostitutes home to become his concubines. Feng is finally killed by his officers, but will the new general rule the city differently?

programme.title: Masked Avengers
programme.desc: Masked killers are wreaking havoc and instilling terror with their vicious weapons of choice: razor-sharp, gut-shattering tridents. Only three fearless fighters dare investigate, leading to mass murder and magnificent martial arts. Chien Hsiao-hou, future co-star of Yuen Woo-ping's THE TAI-CHI MASTER joins the trio to get tri-pierced. The core "Venoms" themselves handle the intricate, always impressive, sometimes awe-inspiring, choreography in this unforgettable exercise in "grand guignol kung-fu."

programme.title: Shaolin Martial Arts
programme.desc: The Qing government assigns fighters to destroy Shaolin Temple and kill all the disciples, but two of them successfully escaped. They train under different masters and learn the Wing Chun and Hung Quan styles respectively, finally killing the fighters and taking revenge for the death of their fellow disciples.

programme.title: Return of the Sentimental Swordsman
programme.desc: One of Shaw Studios highest grossing movies ever, this is the story of Li Chin Huan, the renowned, charming and sentimental swordsman who must fight many opponents, including an evil Clan Chief, for a place in the martial arts world.

programme.title: Forever Diamonds
programme.desc: Hua, a pretty fraud, steals a brilliant diamond ring from a shop in Hong Kong and escapes to Singapore. To smuggle the ring pass customs, Hua slips it into the pocket of a stranger, Yen, but then lost track of him. Hua finally spots Yen after searching for days and does everything to get close to him in order to take the ring back.

programme.title: Iron Bodyguard
programme.desc: Wang Wu, the head of a security firm Iron Bodyguard, meets a scholar who is a member of the Reformists, a group of scholars pressing for social reform in China at the end of the Qing dynasty. The Emperor actually supports such reforms but not the Empress Dowager. She orders the Reformists to be arrested and Wang Wu gets drawn into the politics.

programme.title: Hong Kong Nocturne
programme.desc: This joyous, raucous, & colorful tunefest showcases the little seen dancing talents of celebrated kung-fu swordswoman Cheng Pei-Pei, as one of 3 girls dancing their way to the top.

programme.title: The Shaolin Avengers
programme.desc: Hu seeks to avenge his father who is being killed by the White-Browed Hermit and his gang. However, he fails in his attempt and is saved by Fang Shi Yu, a youth from Shaolin whose parents are also killed by the same villains. They learn and master the advanced Shaolin style kung fu, before Fang leads Hu and the Shaolin fellows to fight the enemies.

programme.title: The Butterfly Chalice
programme.desc: Starring the stunning, teenage heartthrob Pat Ting Hung, The Butterfly Chalice marks the important directing debut of the kung-fu film genre's most principle figure Chang Cheh, as he burst the martial arts and swordplay movie doors wide open, announcing the beginning of the end for the Cantonese musicals.

programme.title: Ten Tigers of Kwang Tung
programme.desc: The Ten Tigers of Kwang Tung is a group of anti-Ching martial artists who have killed a Ching official. Years later, when five disciples and descendants of Ten Tigers meet one night, one of them is killed by the son of the late Ching official who returns with a vengeance. They must fight against him to protect the Ten Tigers clan

programme.title: The Thundering Sword
programme.desc: Two disciples, Yu and Zheng, are sent by their master to track down the invincible weapon Thundering Sword to prevent villains from getting it. Yu encounters the daughter of a ruthless clan, Chiao, who is on her way to seek for the sword. They quickly fall for each other, but when Chiao accidentally injures Zheng, things become complicated.

programme.title: The Black Lizard
programme.desc: Young swordsman Lung Fei encounters strange omens portending the death of his fianc. His enquiries with the help of Chief Constable Tieh Hu reveal an astounding story, in this tale of men and women struggling to save their true loves.

programme.title: The Silver Fox
programme.desc: The formidable swordswoman Silver Fox was a child when her father was senselessly wounded by his step brother, and her mother raped. It is payback time eighteen years later, as her father trains her up with kung fu to take revenge on his behalf.

programme.title: Shaolin Mantis
programme.desc: The Emperor orders Feng to find proofs of Master Tians rebellion in his house. Feng falls in love with Tians granddaughter and marries her. When he finds the proofs and tries to leave with her, his wife is killed in the fight against Tian. Feng creates the mantis-style martial arts and vows to avenge her death.

programme.title: Enchanting Shadow
programme.desc: A young scholar Ning spends the night in a creepy temple that is said to be haunted. He does not believe in the rumours, but soon meets a beautiful female ghost Nie. Nie is forced to stay in the temple to seduce young men for a powerful demon to feast on. Knowing Nie to be a kind ghost, Ning decides to help her escape from the demons clutches.

programme.title: Crocodile River
programme.desc: This story has a Romeo and Juliet flavour. Two families who hate each other live across the opposite sides of a river filled with crocodiles and do not bother to have a bridge built. Their respective children meet in university and fall in love, but have to find ways to be together and resolve the hatred between their families.

programme.title: Death Duel
programme.desc: Third Master is a renowned swordsman in the martial arts world, but the constant challenges by other swordsmen compel him to fake his death and pursue a secluded life. This does not prevent others from seeking him out to challenge him however, and he is forced to return to fight his way till the end.

programme.title: The Three Smiles
programme.desc: A talented scholar, Bo Hu, is attracted by the pretty maid, Qiu Xiang. In order to get close to her and win her love, he disguises as a servant to work in the same household. Qiu Xiang does not believe Bo Hu when he discloses his true identity to her, only falling in love with him when he reveals his talents and with his friends help.

programme.title: The Magnificent Swordsman
programme.desc: The Magnificent Swordsman centres on the hero who vows vengeance against evil bandits who killed his family when he was a child. The hero recruits several friends to help the peasants rid their village of marauding bandits, the leader of the band being the man who killed his family.

programme.title: Apartment for Ladies
programme.desc: A Taiwanese singer comes to Hong Kong in search for her missing younger sister, who had arrived in Hong Kong to be discovered as a nightclub singer. She finds lodging at an apartment for women run by a man-hating landlady, Mrs Chan. However, Mrs Chan cannot confine the young ladies youthful vitality within the apartment.

programme.title: The Boxer From The Temple
programme.desc: A young monk, The Kid, was expelled from the temple due to his crazy ways. After leaving the temple, he fights a cruel bandit's son and befriends a prostitute. As he fights for justice, his Crazy Lo Han Fist improves with every fight.

programme.title: Honey Bunny As Police Patrol Ep1
programme.desc: A hilarious animal chase comedy about the secret life and adventures of a dog, a parrot and twin bobcats living with Ms Katkar

programme.desc: A thief plans the robbery of a lifetime. However, he wakes up one morning to realise that he has lost his memory and his life is at stake.

programme.title: Jaal
programme.desc: Fate plays a cruel game when Shankar gets hired by a rich woman named Amita who bears an uncanny resemblance with Meenabai, the person who breaks his family apart.

programme.title: Chhote Sarkar
programme.desc: Amar, a rich businessman, is framed by two undercover police officers, Seema and Jagmohan, for the murder of his uncle. To evade prison, he claims to be of unsound mind and tries to solve the mystery.

programme.title: Raduaa

programme.title: Humse Badhkar Kaun

programme.title: Aakhri Adalat

programme.title: Arjun Gowda

programme.title: The Jackal

programme.title: The Final Cut

programme.desc: A flood brings new challenges for the big cats; for the first time, the lion cubs experience water and the danger it brings.

programme.desc: The second leg of Anton and Giovanni's trip takes them to Mount Etna, Europe's most active volcano, where they are joined by 2021 Strictly champion Rose Ayling-Ellis.

programme.title: Ancient Powers S1 Ep6
programme.desc: End Game - Our ancient powers have endured for centuries but destruction is close at hand. What will cause their downfall? And who will create a lasting legacy?

programme.title: Tales from Zambia S2 Ep3
programme.desc: Safari CSI - Everyday in the Luangwa Valley a carcass is sighted. Each body holds the story that lead them to their death. In Safari CSI we investigate what killed three carcasses that have been uncovered...

programme.title: Island of the Monsoon S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Queen of Yala - The shadowy forests of Yala National Park are the perfect hideout for secretive leopards. Its time for one young female, Asha, to strike out alone. Join her as she fights for her own territory, finds a mate, and becomes a mother.

programme.title: Island of the Monsoon S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Loka the Baby Elephant - Every year, the biggest elephant congregation in Asia occurs in Minneriya National Park. Here in this sacred place, baby Loka is born. Watch as he learns to suckle, swim and handle his trunk among the mle of giants that make up his family.

programme.title: Wildlife ER S3 Ep3
programme.desc: Nobody Likes Visiting the Dentist - Head into surgery with Mara the koala, who needs a life-saving tooth operation, then assess an injured sugar glider with vet Tim. Cheer as rescue officer Elise pulls a flying fox out of a gutter and see nurse Brees clutch of python eggs hatch.

programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Creature Comforts - This episode of Amazing Animal Friends features a troop of rescue center monkeys that have adopted a litter of stray kittens, a loyal dog helping a rescued raccoon overcome her fears, and an emu raised by Irish setters.

programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends S1 Ep6
programme.desc: To the Rescue - Meet more Amazing Animal Friends, including ranch manager Barclay, a Great Dane who happens to be a gifted horse whisperer. In Africa, a tiny marmoset called Thor has become obsessed with two young rescued mongooses.

programme.title: Wild Crusades S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Search for the Secret Bear - The forests of Yala National Park are home to the enigmatic sloth bear. Shy by nature, this animal is seldom seen and rarely filmed. Join a team of wildlife filmmakers as they reveal this mysterious bears life and behaviour as never seen before.

programme.desc: Life in Dark Water - Learn how winters arrival triggers animal survival instincts in southwestern New Zealand. Track dolphins as they move to warmer waters to give their calves a fighting chance, and join longfin eels on an epic migration to their spawning grounds.

programme.title: Supersenses S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Super Sight - Vision its how ninety-five percent of animals interpret the world. Every species on Earth is a chapter in the fascinating story of sight. This episode follows that story from blurry beginnigs to mind-blowing hexnocular vision.

programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth S1 Ep3
programme.desc: May-June - a Time of Volatility - Watch summer unfold in the Northern Hemisphere, while regions close to the equator enter the wet season and Southern Africa goes dry, creating scarcity for some creatures and bounty for others.

programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth S1 Ep4
programme.desc: July-August - a Time of Migration - Witness some of the planets most dramatic natural shifts in July, from the Arctic ice sheets that come crashing down during the summer melt to the feeding frenzy when sockeye salmon reach the end of their journey in Alaska.

programme.title: Shadowlands S1 Ep1

programme.desc: ...Century. Albums come and go but these 20 albums remain timeless no matter the year! Hosted by Becca Dudley, check out classic albums MTV adores and for good reason!

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep11
programme.desc: Catch Me If You Sam / Toy Driver - Its Tag and Scoochs first day of Race Cadets and Sam Whippet tells the Cadets that whoever can catch him in a race will be the new team captain. \ When Mom donates a box of Tags old toys to the new daycare center, Tag decides that the only way to get her box of toys back is to go around town collecting toys to swap out for her toys.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep12
programme.desc: Frank and Beans with Chili / Little Hound on the Prairie - Beans is nervous that Frank is starting to make a new best friend, so Beans enlists Tag to help him win Frank back. \ Grandpaw and Grandmaw tell Tag the story of the early days of Pawston. Tags ancestor, Tagatha, built a steam-engine and turned Pawston from a one-house town into a thriving community.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep19
programme.desc: FOMO-OPUP / Lost in the Woods - Poppy and Archer get lost in Troll Forest together during one of his escape attempts and must learn to trust each other/Obsessed with finding Nova Swift's next pop-up party, Guy Diamond enlists the Snack Pack to help him on the hunt

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep20
programme.desc: Party Crashed - When the Party Crashers invade Troll Village, they trap Poppy and Branch, party throughout the village, and challenge the Trolls to a dramatic sing-off

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep71
programme.desc: One More Cup, Part 2 - King Julien discovers tea which becomes a huge hit throughout the kingdom but when Karls brother Bruce invites him to his coffee corporation trouble start to brew

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep72
programme.desc: There Will Be Juice - When a crate of PURE ORGANIC IMPOSSIBLY SAFE ORGANIC NUTRIENTS washes onto shore King Julien accidentally overfeeds the crops creating a giant mango that tries to take over the world

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep45
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Disturbing Dilemma Of The Dysfunctional Doppelgangers - The crew meets their blue-hued doppelgngers when they crash-land on an alien planet where kids call all the shots.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep46
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Confusing Crisis Of The Conniving Captive - Melvin isn't exactly their friend ... but it's not like George and Harold can just let him be held captive by diabolical Biglyans, right? Right?!?

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep36
programme.desc: Pirate Booty - After pirates invade San Lorenzo searching for mystical treasure, Puss leads them on the hunt, hoping his share will defend against the Bloodwolf

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep10
programme.desc: Talent Show / Sad Sad Plant - Kelp writes a song about him and Scallop to perform at the unicorn show. But when it comes time, Scallop wants to keep the song just for them, leaving Kelp to come up with anew act- and fast! / The kids all visit the magical musical plant greenhouse on Unicorn Land. They each pick a plant to take care of, and for Kelp its a sad, almost dead plant that he falls in love with.

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries Ep10
programme.desc: Things That Go Bump / Hide Like a Dew Drop - When "something" starts snatching things and causing havoc in Marcus' house, Phoebe and the Dew Drops investigate only to find that it's a stray kitten that they need to catch and find a home for before Marcus returns home. But in the end, Marcus decides to take the kitty in, as his own. / Lola isn't very good at Hide & Seek so the Dew Drops help her improve her game. But she becomes so good that no one can find her! And now shes going to be late to her own surprise tea party!

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep10
programme.desc: Slobber Power - Cutter gets a chance to be a "mom" when a newly hatched dragon bonds with him, and they'll both be needed to get the others out of a tangled mess.

programme.title: Go Dog Go! Ep36
programme.desc: Trick or Thief / Meow-Lo-Ween - Tag and Scooch attend a Howl-O-Ween costume party at the Big Bowl Diner, excited to get a taste of Wagnes famous Pupclairs. But when the lights go out and the treats go missing, it's up to Tag to solve the case. / Tag and Scooch are determined to throw a Howl-O-Ween party for their cat friends in Meowbuquerque, but they must get the dogs of Pawston to change their ways so they can make the celebration more cat-friendly.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep16
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Harmful Horrors of the Harrowing Hiveschool - After injecting all the teachers with bee DNA, the Melvins run the new "hivemind" of the school. But Ms. Ribble is accidently injected with too much "Bee- NA" and becomes the queen bee, overpowering the Melvins' control. George, Harold and the recently re-hired Vice Principal Krupp must work with the Melvins and stop her from turning everyone into her Zombees.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep17
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Preposterous Pulverizing of the Pestering Poopacabra - In hopes of raising their grades so they can go to Lake Summer Camp, George and Harold must teach Ratrick, their assigned rat, a simple task. But Ratrick runs away into the sewers where he is doused with toxic waste and transformed into Poopacabra! It's now up to the boys and Captain Underpants to stop the beast before it takes over Piqua with its stench, and more importantly, ruins the boys' chances to go to Lake Summer Camp.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep18
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Dastardlys Deed of the Devious Diddlysaurus - George and Harold decide to do an extra credit project on dinosaurs to help their chances of getting summer camp-worthy grades. When Melvin brings in a dinosaur frozen in ice, the boys try to get rid of it. But the ice thaws and they meet Diddlysaurus, a prankster raptor who's huge fans of the boys. He offers to help them with their project if he can pull pranks with them, but when the pranks go too far, the boys and Captain Underpants have to deal with the dino.

programme.title: Dragons: Riders of Berk Ep16
programme.desc: Defiant One - Hiccup and Snotlout struggle to find their way back from Outcast Island.

programme.title: Dragons: Riders of Berk Ep17
programme.desc: Breakneck Bog - Hiccup and the gang journey to haunted Breakneck Bog to find a lost gift for Hiccup.

programme.title: Dragons: Riders of Berk Ep18
programme.desc: Gem of a Different Color - Fishlegs finds a special gem, but a flock of dangerous Changewings want it back.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep72
programme.desc: Floaties - A bummed out Tina takes a vacation to the baby resort, Floaties! However, her mind is still back at work, and struggled to actually enjoy her vacation. And it gets worse when Crispin Biscuits switches electronic ID tags with her, causing everyone to assume Tina actually is Crispin Biscuits. With Crispin having booked her for a seemingly endless stay, Tina is trapped in a paradise nightmare, and in a tunnel of madness starts to think that she may even be Crispin.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep73
programme.desc: Breaking The Bank - Crispin Biscuits heists the underwater Baby Bank in an attempt to steal all the funds from Boss and Tinas new company. Boss, Tina and Banker Baby Benny must infiltrate the bank via submarine to stop this high-stakes aquatic robbery. But Boss and Tina struggle to stay on the same page after Tina admits that she might, kinda, sorta be thinking about retiring as a regular baby.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep74
programme.desc: Hate That Baby! - After Crispin Biscuits changes the Baby Love economy to reward companies for bringing in baby hate, Boss Baby is forced to make himself the most hated baby in town to save their startup company. Meanwhile, Tina needs to end Crispin Biscuits attacks on their company before she can finally hang up her boss role and retire to a life of cuddle time with daddy and mommy.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep37
programme.desc: The Poison Ravine - There is more epic action and intrigue as Po and the Dragon Knights continue their quest to destroy the Tianshang weapons, but find themselves in treacherous waters when they are captured by pirates, one of which is out for revenge against Mr. Ping! The adventures lead them to London, where they are wanted by the Knights. Old enemies resurface and Blade will have to face one of her most challenging opponentsher mom. And somehow, Po finds himself in a chess tournament against the Queen of England!

programme.desc: Mall Is Well / Taco Tank - Turbo competes in a crazy underground race through a mall.//Tito trades in his food truck for a tank and goes on a wild ride through the city.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep20
programme.desc: Zoo-Lander / Balloonatics - Shadow and Skidmark embark on a perilous adventure through the zoo to rescue Deuce.//Whiplash attempts to keep the crew from meeting his parents.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep19
programme.desc: Towaconstrictors - Revvit maps a path to a magical forest where the Dinotrux can explore and have fun, but once they arrive the crew is startled by Towaconstrictors

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep20
programme.desc: Desert Scraptors - When the Desert Scraptors mistakenly think Click-Clack is their leader, D-Structs' plan to have them attack Ty and the crew is derailed.

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep31
programme.desc: Toddle-Lu, Mexico City - Odlulu wants her own quinceaera, a traditional Mexican celebration for a girl's 15th birthday, so she uses the Grow-Up Key to skip ahead a few years. But the key backfires and turns her into a toddler! Fritz must babysit Toddler Odlulu as she wanders through Mexico City, all while Wally and Wenda try to retrieve the Grow-Up Key and get Odlulu back to her normal age

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep32
programme.desc: Mongolia-saurus - The Wanderers receive a WanderPost with some odd news from paleontologist, WIZARD AMBER: living dinosaurs are roaming around Mongolia! Odlulu and Fritz are using the DINO KEY to get the ultimate pets: real dinosaurs! So Wally and Wenda must use their dino-knowledge to wrangle these prehistoric animals before they overrun all of Mongolia.

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries Ep11
programme.desc: Chore Score / Dew Drop Swap - On Harpers first allowance day, the pets accidentally knock Harpers Piggy Bank over and lose one of her quarters that she was reserving to buy Nicholas an ice cream cone. Now the Dew Drops must scramble to replace it! / When the Dew Drops struggle to help their kids with tasks that are outside their usual fairy-bilities, they decide to swap kids for the day, but ultimately learn they re exactly where they need to be because they know their families so well!

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep11
programme.desc: Salty and Sweet / Cruz Blues - Chef J tells Ollie he cooks with love. Kelp and Ollie set out to make food with love for him. When various food combos fail, Ollie considers giving up, because it isnt good enough. Kelp goes to his Dad for answers, and two seemingly different ingredients form something magical. / When Cruz is not his usual upbeat self, Kelp tries various ways to cheer him up before realizing the best way to be a good friend is to just sit with him, and let him feel what hes feeling.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep27
programme.desc: O Captain, My Captain Part 1 - Prince Barty and Princess Julienne, King Julien's needy and dramatic parents, must take over for their son when he's held captive on a pirate ship

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep29
programme.desc: The Bog-ey Man of Festermouth - There is more epic action and intrigue as Po and the Dragon Knights continue their quest to destroy the Tianshang weapons, but find themselves in treacherous waters when they are captured by pirates, one of which is out for revenge against Mr. Ping! The adventures lead them to London, where they are wanted by the Knights. Old enemies resurface and Blade will have to face one of her most challenging opponentsher mom.
