programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep77
programme.desc: The Unshakeable Bear - Boss scours Chicago to find his old co-worker nemesis Board Member Bradley, his key to cutting a deal with the Federal Agents for his freedom. However, he must lose the tail of Canadas most notorious fugitive tracker, a trained bear cub named Henri. Meanwhile, Tina is trapped at home with her paranoid grandma Yaya, forced to prove to her that shes not a criminal baby like the news is causing Yaya to believe.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep1
programme.desc: Hidden - Puss stumbles upon the legendary hidden city of San Lorenzo, and soon finds himself forced to protect it from thieves.

programme.title: Dragons: Riders of Berk Ep17
programme.desc: Breakneck Bog - Hiccup and the gang journey to haunted Breakneck Bog to find a lost gift for Hiccup.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep27
programme.desc: Lucky and La Voltereta Feroz - While Lucky and Spirit struggle to find their place In the circus, Pru and Abigail set out across the frontier to track down their runaway friend

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep1
programme.desc: Somewhere / Over the Rainbow - Kelp is swept by an ocean current to the shore of Unicorn Land where he sees a majestic creature on a cliff that looks just like him, but not like his Narwhal family under the sea. Kelp tells his family hes a unicorn. / Kelp returns to Unicorn Land where he meets Pixie and Juniper, who show him around and introduce him to unicorn spark and magic.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep2
programme.desc: Tacos / Rainy Day - When Kelp is introduced to crunchy tacos in Unicorn Land, he must use his bubble sparks to bring them back to his family underwater. / Kelps unicorn friends are going to teach him Swishbee on land. But it rains and the game is called off until Kelp shows them that playing in the water can be even more fun.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep9
programme.desc: Lost and Found / In the Park In the Dark - The Community Center's Lost and Found is full and it's up to the gang to use their detective skills and return the lost items to their original owners. / Rodney only needs one more bird on his birdwatching list, but the only problem is that it only comes out at night! Team Zenko must help Rodney face his fear of the dark so he can get the last picture for his collection.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep10
programme.desc: Longest Yardwork / The Girl Who Cried Goose - Donna plans a garden party for Rona, but the only problem is that her garden is overgrown and neglected. The team try to transform this jungle into a backyard just in time for the party. / Lula finds an angry goose on the loose, and Team Zenko need to get it out of the park before soccer camp starts.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep1
programme.desc: The Nest - When the Rescue Riders save Viking chief Duggard, theyre invited to visit his village of Huttsgalor, where they must prove they're kind and helpful.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep2
programme.desc: Deep Trouble - Dak's lack of planning gets him, Cutter and Winger lost with Elbone in the Maze Caves, and Leyla's overthinking threatens the effort to rescue them.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep13
programme.desc: Chaser And Chewer / Recipe For Adventure - Tag and Scooch pretend to be their favorite comic book heroes and help the dogs of Pawston. But when Frank and Beans pretend to be villains its up to Chaser and Chewer to stop the trouble makers and save the day. \ Its Bring Your Own Bowl Night at the Barker house, and Tag and Grandmaw team up to make Great Great Auntie Eunice's Famous Far Fetched Cookies. But the obscure ingredients are hard to find, so they have to team up and go on an adventure.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep14
programme.desc: Raiders of the Lost Bark / Slow, Dog. Slow! - When Tag and Scooch break Gilbers ancient Golden Slipper, they embark on an adventure to a secret cave to retrieve the matching slipper. \ For community outreach day, the Race Cadets are paired with an elderly resident of Pawston. It's Tag and Scooch's job to take old dog Leo around town for a day of slow, relaxing activities. But when Leo wants to kickbarx, row and skydive, Tag and Scooch try their best to keep up.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep21
programme.desc: Weekend at Diamonds / Brancheption - Guy creates a new invention, the Farty Party/When Branch is trapped in a dream by a mysterious critter called the Dream Sucker, he must find a way to escape

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep22
programme.desc: The Bunker List / The Interns - Branch bets Guy and Smidge that he can complete his Bunker List in one day/Satin and Chenille get the chance to intern for their idol Nova Swift

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep73
programme.desc: Blackboard Jungle - King Julien organizes an Academic Bowl to prove the lemurs are the smartest on the island

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep74
programme.desc: Lord Of The Fruit Flies - King Julien tries to rig an election so that Maurice becomes Mango Prime Minister but soon realizes his opponent Mort has a better shot than everyone thinks

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep47
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Aggravated Assault Of The Alien Armada - Oh, the indignity: George and Harold are forced to perform spa treatments on gigantic Biglyans. Also, Dr. Fitzgibbons reveals a shocking secret.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep1
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and The Frenzied Farts of Flabby Flabulous - George and Harold create a comic book about their gym teacher, but after a freak accident turns fantasy into reality, the best friends must run from his revenge

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep37
programme.desc: Cat Fish - When pirates force Puss to face his fear of water by walking the ship's plank, he is rescued by his ex-girlfriend and fish monster, Feejee the Mermaid.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep11
programme.desc: Salty and Sweet / Cruz Blues - Chef J tells Ollie he cooks with love. Kelp and Ollie set out to make food with love for him. When various food combos fail, Ollie considers giving up, because it isnt good enough. Kelp goes to his Dad for answers, and two seemingly different ingredients form something magical. / When Cruz is not his usual upbeat self, Kelp tries various ways to cheer him up before realizing the best way to be a good friend is to just sit with him, and let him feel what hes feeling.

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries Ep11
programme.desc: Chore Score / Dew Drop Swap - On Harpers first allowance day, the pets accidentally knock Harpers Piggy Bank over and lose one of her quarters that she was reserving to buy Nicholas an ice cream cone. Now the Dew Drops must scramble to replace it! / When the Dew Drops struggle to help their kids with tasks that are outside their usual fairy-bilities, they decide to swap kids for the day, but ultimately learn they re exactly where they need to be because they know their families so well!

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep11
programme.desc: Crash Course - Burple and Winger each injure a wing while they're with Dak, and only teamwork can get them home. At the roost, Cutter gets stuck in a puddle of goo.

programme.title: Go Dog Go! Ep37
programme.desc: The Trouble with Kibbles / Road to Kindness - When Tag asks Mom to be the pilot for the upcoming Dogcaththlon race, Mom isnt sure she is ready. Until Paw reminds her of the day she saved Pawston! Mom tells the story of how she used her blimp to save the city from an eruption at the kibble factory. / Pawston is hosting a Roller Disco Night in the park, but Frank isn't allowed to attend due to last year's poor behavior. Tag convinces Mayor Sniffington to let Frank come to the party if he passes Leo's Road to Kindness.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep19
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Shadowy Syndrome of the Sinister Splotch - Captain Underpants becomes a wanted man in underwear when footage surfaces of a robber who looks exactly like him. George and Harold, positive it's an impostor, try to track down the perp and bring him to justice. But can the boys do this before Captain Underpants is found guilty?

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep20
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Bizarre Blitzkrieg of the Bothersome Butt-erflies - As a prank, George and Harold use Melvin's new animal hybrid invention to create a creature that's a cross between a butt and a fly. But some of the monster butt-erflies want to eat everything in sight- including the students hiding out in the school gym!

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep21
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Problematic Pandemonium of the Punishing Plungerina - After helping George and Harold make a comic featuring the heroine Plungerina, Erica asserts that Plungerina could be better that Captain Underpants. To prove her wrong, the boys decide to actually create the villain in the comic and then have Captain Underpants save the day. Unfortunately, Krupp - and therefore Captain Underpants - is away at a principals' convention.There's no one to save them...until a real life Plungerina saves tthe day! But who is really Plungerina?

programme.title: Dragons: Riders of Berk Ep19
programme.desc: We Are Family (Part 1) - Hiccup and Toothless search for other Night Furies.

programme.title: Dragons: Riders of Berk Ep20
programme.desc: We Are Family (Part 2) - Hiccup and Toothless are kidnapped and must escape Outcast Island.

programme.title: Dragons: Riders of Berk Ep11
programme.desc: Heather Report Part II - Hiccup and the gang infiltrate the outsiders in order to free Heathers parents.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep75
programme.desc: North of the Border - With his identity as a fugitive businessman exposed, Boss Baby has been hiding out in the lawless land of Canada. But hes forced back into action over a new crisis with Baby Love: several criminals have copycatted Bosss fugitive strategy, somehow turning themselves into babies to hide out from the law. While Tina works on exposing these new fake baby criminals to the world, Boss makes a dangerous journey across Canada to sneak back over the U.S. border.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep76
programme.desc: Intensive Purposes - After getting caught at the border, Boss, Tim, JJ, and Pip have to organize an escape from a former novelty restaurant turned interrogation facility using only the four phone calls theyve been given. Meanwhile, Tina has a plan for Dez to infiltrate the criminal baby organization to break them up from the inside, but its complicated when Tinas new assistant Temp Baby Aubrey accidentally takes over Dezs undercover baby criminal role.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep77
programme.desc: The Unshakeable Bear - Boss scours Chicago to find his old co-worker nemesis Board Member Bradley, his key to cutting a deal with the Federal Agents for his freedom. However, he must lose the tail of Canadas most notorious fugitive tracker, a trained bear cub named Henri. Meanwhile, Tina is trapped at home with her paranoid grandma Yaya, forced to prove to her that shes not a criminal baby like the news is causing Yaya to believe.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep40
programme.desc: A Teacup Filled with the Self - There is more epic action and intrigue as Po and the Dragon Knights continue their quest to destroy the Tianshang weapons, but find themselves in treacherous waters when they are captured by pirates, one of which is out for revenge against Mr. Ping! The adventures lead them to London, where they are wanted by the Knights. Old enemies resurface and Blade will have to face one of her most challenging opponentsher mom. And somehow, Po finds himself in a chess tournament against the Queen of England!

programme.desc: Packet Racket / Smack Me Down - When a shady group of bugs moves into the city selling artificial ketchup, Turbo and Shadow go undercover to expose who is behind the operation. // After Turbo is challenged to compete in an underground smack-talk contest, he must get lessons from the best insult snail there is, Burn.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep22
programme.desc: Smoovin On Up / The Great Shell Robbery - Smoove Move goes from underground street artist to world-famous pedicurist and lets his newfound fame go to his head. // Thieving hermit crabs steal the crew's shells, so they concoct an elaborate heist to get them back.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep21
programme.desc: Water - The Dinotrux crew builds an aqueduct to bring water back to the Flatirons during a drought, but D-Structs tries to sabotage their plan.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep22
programme.desc: Wind - A fierce windstorm traps the gang inside the garage and they have fun together all night, but once the food runs out they team up to find a way out.

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep33
programme.desc: Nepal: Yeti Or Not - When a Yeti is spotted in Nepal, chasing away all the locals, the Wanderers investigate only to find out its another Odlulu plot. They must work with Wizard Rockybeard to stop Yeti-Fritz get the Furball Key back

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep34
programme.desc: A Welsh Trick & Treat - Its Halloween time and the Wanderers get a WanderPost from Odlulu issuing a challenge: Come to my Haunted House in Wales if you dare! Wally and Wenda, arent scared by Odlulu and Fritzs attempt at creating a haunted house with goofy Halloween decorations. So Odlulu uses the magical Haunted House Key to bring a few of the decorations to life.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S2 Ep201
programme.desc: Pups Save the Penguins / Pups Save a Dolphin Pup - Someone has been swiping fish off Capn Turbots boat, so he calls Ryder and the PAW Patrol to help investigate. // Dolphin Pup accidentally swims into a shallow water stream! Now its up to Ryder and PAW Patrol to get her back into the Bay.

programme.title: UFC 312: Du Plessis vs. Strickland 2
programme.desc: Prelims - UFC returns down under to Sydney, Australia on February 9, and all eyes will be on Qudos Bank Arena when middleweight champion Dricus Du Plessis defends his crown against the man he took it from, Sean Strickland, in the main event of UFC 312. The first time this pair met last January, it was one of the best fights of 2024 as Du Plessis defeated Strickland by a narrow split decision. Now theyll run it back in Sydney. Plus, dominant strawweight champion Zhang Weili will put her belt on the line against unbeaten Tatiana Suarez in a highly anticipated title fight.

programme.title: UFC 312: Du Plessis vs. Strickland 2

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Adesanya vs. Imavov
programme.desc: Prelims - The Octagon is back in Riyadh, Kingdom of Saudi Arabia, on February 1 for a UFC Fight Night event featuring the return of a former middleweight champion with his sights on regaining his crown. But before Israel Adesanya gears up for a title run, he has to get by surging contender Nassourdine Imavov. One of the most dominant champions of his era, Adesanya aims to get his 2025 campaign off to a winning start against Imavov, who has won three in a row leading up to the biggest fight of his career. In the co-main event, Middleweight sensation Shara Bullet Magomedov faces off with veteran star Michael Venom Page in a showdown of elite strikers.

programme.title: UFC 312: Du Plessis vs. Strickland 2
programme.desc: Prelims - UFC returns down under to Sydney, Australia on February 9, and all eyes will be on Qudos Bank Arena when middleweight champion Dricus Du Plessis defends his crown against the man he took it from, Sean Strickland, in the main event of UFC 312. The first time this pair met last January, it was one of the best fights of 2024 as Du Plessis defeated Strickland by a narrow split decision. Now theyll run it back in Sydney. Plus, dominant strawweight champion Zhang Weili will put her belt on the line against unbeaten Tatiana Suarez in a highly anticipated title fight.
